alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and south central Charlton Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Taylor, or 14 miles southeast of Fargo, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
